page.title: 06A FARM WORKER, RADLEY GREEN
page.content: I have been a farm worker since I left school. My normal working day is 8 hours but I have worked as late as 11p.m.at harvest. When I worked with cows I used to get up at 4 a.m. but round here it's all arable now. There used to be part-time jobs like potato picking but not any more.Quite a few full-time jobs have gone too like mine for instance. I am pleased I have my own bungalow and not a tied cottage.My job has gone for the moment but at least I keep my home. I have always done general farm work. I might do 5 or 6 different jobs a day like spraying,setting up the combine. heaping corn,baling or carting.Or I might do the same job all day long.My favourite is baling.I can do 2-4,000 bales a day.The job I dislike is spray ing.I might be doing it all day,though I've never been hurt by a spray yet.
